participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Practical and down-to-earth, Alex values functionality over trends and enjoys the simple pleasures in life.
participant_1.background: i do not care about fashion. i hate the color orange. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i compete in dog agility classes.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and disciplined, Jordan takes pride in his physical abilities and enjoys storytelling through his work as a stunt double.
participant_2.background: i never broke a bone in my body ever in my life. i am a stunt double as my second job. i read twenty books a year. i was raised in a single parent household. i only eat kosher.
